We have you covered. 4d Kevin Pelton and Jeremy Woo Glenn James/NBAE via Getty Images CHANGING OF THE GUARD Why LeBron and the Lakers are stuck in limbo For months, publicly and privately, the Lakers have been signaling their desire to begin the Luka Doncic era in Los Angeles, even if it meant ending the LeBron James one. 3d Ramona Shelburne and Brian Windhorst Jesse D. Garrabrant/NBAE via Getty Images SPLASH POWER COUPLE REVEALED Klay Thompson fuels relationship rumors with Megan Thee Stallion on Instagram The Dallas Mavericks guard seemingly posted photos with the Grammy-winning rapper on Instagram over the weekend. 20h Anthony Gharib klaythompson/Instagram NEW FINANCIAL ERA LOOMS The NBA is closing in on its first $1 million per game player The reigning MVP will get close, but the league is still waiting for its first $82 million per year player. 3d Zach Kram Jesse D.
